Were You Injured By A Distracted Driver?

Texting while driving has been shown to decrease one’s ability to safely operate a motor vehicle, similar to intoxication. Texting or surfing on your phone while driving creates an unacceptable level of risk.

Texting is commonplace among young people, who lack the experience that older drivers take for granted. Adding that inexperience to the risks of distracted driving creates an extreme risk to all drivers.

If you or a loved one was injured in an accident that may have involved a distracted driver, reach out to our attorneys for a free consultation. Call us today at 614-360-2706.

Exceptional Legal Team With A Track Record For Getting Results

At Lamkin, Van Eman, Trimble & Dougherty, LLC, our legal team has been helping Columbus injury victims involved in auto accidents since 1968.

All of our attorneys bring decades of individual experience and a superior level of skill and knowledge that allow us to help our clients secure the medical and financial support they need after being seriously injured. We have a track record for success, having recovered multimillion-dollar verdicts and settlements for individuals injured in all types of accidents.

Let Us Fight To Get You The Money You Deserve

When you or a loved one has been seriously injured in an accident involving a distracted driver, you need to know that the lawyer you choose to handle your claim will fight to get you the compensation you deserve.

Turn to our skilled and experienced Ohio personal injury attorneys. To schedule a free initial consultation, call 614-360-2706 today. Or you can contact us online.

We offer contingency fee arrangements, meaning we collect attorneys’ fees only if we recover compensation for you.
